subject: Athletics and Sports
Basketball
Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
lead_paragraph: Jabari Parker’s decision to forgo formal missionary work for the N.B.A. raised eyebrows among some fellow Mormons, but others say he will still be an ambassador for his church.
snippet: Jabari Parker’s decision to forgo formal missionary work for the N.B.A. raised eyebrows among some fellow Mormons, but others say he will still be an ambassador for his church.
